81 H1Bs LIE about their knowledge and qualifications. Basically all of them do it, and they are NEVER asked to prove what they claim to know. Next step... They get hired, get put on a project team, and are nothing but a helpless know nothing dead weight to who has to be hand held and carried across the posted 11 hours ago by HeavenlyTrumpets 3 comments award share report block Finish line. I've seen In person multiple times, multiple employers. The H1B who supposedly knows so much is nothing but a massive liability who slows everyone down. Even without getting rid of H1B, if they somehow had to prove to know what they say they know, almost none of them would be hired. That's too difficult to enforce though..better to just scrap it altogether.
